title: Elsa Hosk is the ultimate style icon as she works FOUR different outfits
text:
She's known for her work with the biggest lingerie brand on the planet.

But Elsa Hosk showed she can shine in more than just her skivvies on Saturday as she was seen posing for a photo shoot in four different outfits on the streets of NYC.

The 30-year-old Victoria's Secret model radiated in ensembles that ranged from a black business suit to a cropped cream sweater and jeans.

Means business: Elsa Hosk showed she can shine in more than just her skivvies on Saturday as she was seen posing for a photo shoot in four different outfits on the streets of NYC

Elsa also donned a mustard-yellow knitted sweater and wide-leg light-wash jeans as well as a trench coat and trousers.

For some of the shots she sizzled with a smokey eye, and for others she slayed with a swipe of simple winged liner.

The Stockholm native got her start at the age of 14, appearing in spreads for Guess, H&M, Lilly Pulitzer, Ungaro, Dior, Gabbana, and others.

Sweet: The 30-year-old Victoria's Secret model radiated in ensembles that ranged from a black business suit to a cropped cream sweater and jeans

On-the-go: Elsa also donned a mustard-yellow knitted sweater and wide-leg light-wash jeans as well as a trench coat and trousers

Chic: For some of the shots she sizzled with a smokey eye, and for others she slayed with a swipe of simple winged liner

As time went on she redirected her focus towards her studies and left the modeling circuit for a few years.

After graduating from high school she took up an interest in basketball and joined the Swedish women's basketball league.

After playing basketball for two years she returned to modeling and was soon signed by IMG Models.

It wasn't long before she got the chance to work with Victoria's Secret and began to appear the fashion shows that she's known for.

Strut: It wasn't long before she got the chance to work with Victoria's Secret and began to appear the fashion shows that she's known for

Although the 5ft 10in beauty is an internationally recognized talent, she admits that at times she doesn't see herself as such.

'Sometimes I see myself in photos, and the image is so different from who I really am,' she told NET-A-PORTER in an interview last year.

'People always put me in things that are super-sexy and very stylized.'

And when she's in front of the camera, she admits to taking on a whole new persona.

'In my head, I’m so not sexy at all. I’m goofy and totally normal,' she told the outlet. 'It’s a character that I get into.'

Elsa is currently dating Tom Daly, co-founder and creative director of Running Vision, a company that manufactures sunglasses for running.

The two have been partnered for four years.
